adapter.queryTemplate:
DEFINE sql:select-option "order"

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX sio: <http://semanticscience.org/resource/>
PREFIX faldo: <http://biohackathon.org/resource/faldo#>
PREFIX insdc: <http://ddbj.nig.ac.jp/ontologies/nucleotide/>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX so: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/so#>

SELECT DISTINCT ?uniqueId ?type ?start ?end ?sub_uniqueId ?sub_type ?sub_start ?sub_end ?sub_sub_uniqueId ?sub_sub_type ?sub_sub_start ?sub_sub_end ?strand ?name ?description ?sub_name ?sub_description ?sub_class ?sub_sub_name
FROM <http://togovar.biosciencedbc.jp/graph/ensembl37>
WHERE {
  VALUES ?region_start { {start} }
  VALUES ?region_end { {end} }
  VALUES ?chr_id { <http://identifiers.org/hco/{refName}#GRCh37> }

  # gene
  BIND ("gene" AS ?type)
  ?uniqueId so:part_of ?chr_id .
  ?uniqueId faldo:location ?loc .
  ?loc faldo:begin/rdf:type ?faldo_type .
  ?loc faldo:begin/faldo:position ?start_pos .
  ?loc faldo:end/faldo:position ?end_pos .

  FILTER (?faldo_type IN (faldo:ForwardStrandPosition, faldo:ReverseStrandPosition, faldo:BothStrandsPosition))
  BIND (IF (?faldo_type = faldo:ForwardStrandPosition, 1, IF (?faldo_type = faldo:ReverseStrandPosition, -1, 0)) AS ?strand)
  BIND (IF (?faldo_type = faldo:ReverseStrandPosition, ?end_pos, ?start_pos) AS ?start)
  BIND (IF (!(?faldo_type = faldo:ReverseStrandPosition), ?end_pos, ?start_pos) AS ?end)

  FILTER (!(?start > ?region_end || ?end < ?region_start))

  # transcript
  BIND ("mRNA" AS ?sub_type)
  ?sub_uniqueId so:part_of ?uniqueId .
  ?sub_uniqueId rdf:type ?sub_class_orig .
  FILTER (!strstarts(str(?sub_class_orig), "http://rdf.ebi.ac.uk/terms/ensembl/"))
  BIND (IF (?sub_class_orig = obo:SO_0001217, obo:SO_0000316, ?sub_class_orig) AS ?sub_class)

  ?sub_uniqueId faldo:location ?sub_loc .
  ?sub_loc faldo:begin/faldo:position ?sub_start_pos .
  ?sub_loc faldo:end/faldo:position ?sub_end_pos .
  BIND (IF (?faldo_type = faldo:ReverseStrandPosition, ?sub_end_pos, ?sub_start_pos) AS ?sub_start)
  BIND (IF (!(?faldo_type = faldo:ReverseStrandPosition), ?sub_end_pos, ?sub_start_pos) AS ?sub_end)

  # sub_sub_
  BIND ("CDS" AS ?sub_sub_type)
  ?sub_uniqueId so:has_part ?sub_sub_uniqueId .

  ?sub_sub_uniqueId faldo:location ?sub_sub_loc .
  ?sub_sub_loc faldo:begin/faldo:position ?sub_sub_start_pos .
  ?sub_sub_loc faldo:end/faldo:position ?sub_sub_end_pos .
  BIND (IF (?faldo_type = faldo:ReverseStrandPosition, ?sub_sub_end_pos, ?sub_sub_start_pos) AS ?sub_sub_start)
  BIND (IF (!(?faldo_type = faldo:ReverseStrandPosition), ?sub_sub_end_pos, ?sub_sub_start_pos) AS ?sub_sub_end)

  OPTIONAL { ?uniqueId dct:identifier ?name . }
  OPTIONAL { ?uniqueId rdfs:label ?description . }
  OPTIONAL { ?sub_uniqueId dct:identifier ?sub_name . }
  OPTIONAL { ?sub_uniqueId so:translates_to/dct:identifier ?sub_description . }
  OPTIONAL { ?sub_sub_uniqueId dct:identifier ?sub_sub_name . }
}

DEFINE sql:select-option "order"
PREFIX  rdf:  <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX  insdc: <http://ddbj.nig.ac.jp/ontologies/nucleotide/>
PREFIX  faldo: <http://biohackathon.org/resource/faldo#>
PREFIX  xsd:  <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX  sio:  <http://semanticscience.org/resource/>
PREFIX  rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX  obo:  <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?uniqueId ("gene" AS ?type) ?start ?end ?sub_uniqueId ("mRNA" AS ?sub_type) ?sub_start ?sub_end ?sub_sub_uniqueId ("CDS" AS ?sub_sub_type) ?sub_sub_start ?sub_sub_end ?faldo_type ?strand (?strand AS ?sub_strand) (?strand AS ?sub_sub_strand) ?name ?description ?sub_name ?sub_description ?sub_class
FROM <http://togogenome.org/graph/refseq>
FROM <http://togogenome.org/graph/so>
FROM <http://togogenome.org/graph/faldo>
WHERE
  { VALUES ?sub_class { obo:SO_0000316 obo:SO_0000253 obo:SO_0000252 }
    ?refseq_id  insdc:sequence_version  "{refName}" ;
              insdc:sequence        ?seq_id .
    ?uniqueId  obo:so_part_of        ?seq_id ;
              rdfs:subClassOf       obo:SO_0000704 ;
              faldo:location        ?loc .
    ?loc  faldo:begin          ?begin .
    ?begin    faldo:position        ?start_pos .
    ?loc faldo:end/faldo:position ?end_pos
      { BIND(faldo:ForwardStrandPosition AS ?faldo_type)
        BIND(1 AS ?strand)
        ?begin  rdf:type  faldo:ForwardStrandPosition
      }
    UNION
      { BIND(faldo:ReverseStrandPosition AS ?faldo_type)
        BIND(-1 AS ?strand)
        ?begin  rdf:type  faldo:ReverseStrandPosition
      }
    UNION
      { BIND(faldo:BothStrandPosition AS ?faldo_type)
        BIND(0 AS ?strand)
        ?begin  rdf:type  faldo:BothStrandPosition
      }
    FILTER ( ! ( ( ?start_pos > {end} ) || ( ?end_pos < {start} ) ) )
    ?sub_uniqueId  obo:so_part_of   ?uniqueId ;
              rdfs:subClassOf  ?sub_class ;
              faldo:location   ?sub_loc .
    ?sub_loc faldo:begin/faldo:position ?sub_start_pos .
    ?sub_loc faldo:end/faldo:position ?sub_end_pos .
    ?sub_uniqueId  obo:so_has_part  ?sub_sub_uri ;
              sio:SIO_000974   ?uuid .
    ?uuid     sio:SIO_000628   ?sub_sub_uri .
    ?sub_sub_uri  rdfs:subClassOf  obo:SO_0000147 ;
              faldo:location   ?sub_sub_loc .
    ?sub_sub_loc faldo:begin/faldo:position ?sub_sub_start_pos .
    ?sub_sub_loc faldo:end/faldo:position ?sub_sub_end_pos
    OPTIONAL
      { ?uniqueId  rdfs:label  ?name }
    OPTIONAL
      { ?uniqueId  insdc:product  ?product }
    OPTIONAL
      { ?uniqueId  insdc:note  ?note }
    OPTIONAL
      { ?sub_uniqueId  rdfs:label  ?sub_name }
    OPTIONAL
      { ?sub_uniqueId  insdc:product  ?sub_product }
    OPTIONAL
      { ?sub_uniqueId  insdc:note  ?sub_note }
    BIND(if(( ?faldo_type = faldo:ReverseStrandPosition ), ?sub_sub_end_pos, ?sub_sub_start_pos) AS ?sub_sub_start)
    BIND(if(( ?faldo_type = faldo:ReverseStrandPosition ), ?sub_sub_start_pos, ?sub_sub_end_pos) AS ?sub_sub_end)
    BIND(if(( ?faldo_type = faldo:ReverseStrandPosition ), ?end_pos, ?start_pos) AS ?start)
    BIND(if(( ?faldo_type = faldo:ReverseStrandPosition ), ?start_pos, ?end_pos) AS ?end)
    BIND(if(( ?faldo_type = faldo:ReverseStrandPosition ), ?sub_end_pos, ?sub_start_pos) AS ?sub_start)
    BIND(if(( ?faldo_type = faldo:ReverseStrandPosition ), ?sub_start_pos, ?sub_end_pos) AS ?sub_end)
    BIND(iri(concat(str(?sub_sub_uri), "-", str(?uuid))) AS ?sub_sub_uniqueId)
    BIND(coalesce(?product, ?note, "") AS ?description)
    BIND(coalesce(?sub_product, ?sub_note, "") AS ?sub_description)
  }
adapter.refNamesQueryTemplate:
PREFIX  insdc: <http://ddbj.nig.ac.jp/ontologies/nucleotide/>

SELECT DISTINCT  ?refName
WHERE
  { ?refseq_id  insdc:sequence_version  ?refName }
